references.paper_title: Is conditional generative modeling all you need for decision-making?
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the introduction of Diffusion Forcing as a new training paradigm for decision-making tasks.
This paper provides the theoretical foundation for diffusion models, which are central to the development of Diffusion Forcing.

references.paper_title: Planning with diffusion for flexible behavior synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces full-sequence diffusion models, which Diffusion Forcing aims to improve upon.
This paper highlights the capabilities of next-token prediction models, which Diffusion Forcing combines with diffusion models.
This paper demonstrates the application of diffusion models to video generation, a key application area for Diffusion Forcing.
